name: Vision Quest Workshop
purpose: Define the team's shared vision, mission, stakeholders, and success criteria through creative exploration and collaborative discovery

facilitator_requirements.facilitation_notes: This workshop sets the emotional tone for the entire series. Prioritize psychological safety and encourage bold dreaming.

phases.name: Opening and Grounding
phases.description: Welcome the team, introduce Axiom 0, and create a container of love and trust for the journey ahead
activities: Love and Trust check-in: each person shares one hope for this project
ai_prompts: Welcome to your Vision Quest. Today we begin a journey to discover what you truly want to build together.
Before we dive into the work, let's ground ourselves in Axiom 0: All being and doing is grounded in love and trust.
Let's go around the room. Share one hope you have for this project - what impact do you dream of making?

phases.name: Future Headlines Game
phases.description: Imagine success through newspaper headlines from 5 years in the future
activities: Voting on most inspiring headlines (3 min)
ai_prompts: Imagine it's 5 years from now. Your project has succeeded beyond your wildest dreams. Major publications are writing about it.
Write 3-5 newspaper headlines about your project's success. Be specific, vivid, and bold!
What themes do we see across these inspiring headlines? Who are the heroes? What impact is celebrated?

phases.name: Stakeholder Safari Game
phases.description: Discover stakeholder needs through empathetic role-play
activities: Role assignment and character development (8 min)
ai_prompts: Who are all the people affected by your project? Users, customers, team members, partners, communities...
Get into character. What's your stakeholder's name? What's their daily life like? What keeps them up at night?
As [stakeholder name], what do you hope this project will do for you? What's your biggest fear about it?

phases.name: Refresh Break
phases.description: Short break to refresh before synthesis work

phases.name: Mission Crystallization Discussion
phases.description: Deep discussion to converge on a shared mission statement and success criteria
ai_prompts: Based on our headlines and safari, what is the one sentence that captures WHY this project should exist?
Who are our primary stakeholders? In what order do we serve them?
How will we know if we've succeeded? What's the single most important outcome?

phases.name: Vision Questionnaire
phases.description: Capture individual perspectives to ensure all voices are heard

phases.name: Closing and Preview
phases.description: Present draft Team Charter, reflect on insights, preview next workshop
ai_prompts: Here's the draft Team Charter based on our work today. Review it and note any adjustments needed.
What surprised you today? What did you learn about your team?
Next time, we'll explore the ethical foundation for your work in the Ethics Arena. Come ready to debate!

questions.question: On a scale of 1-10, how aligned do you feel with the mission we've drafted?
What's one thing about the vision that excites you most?
What concern do you have that we haven't addressed?
Who is the single most important stakeholder we should serve?

discussion_formats.name: Affinity Mapping
discussion_formats.description: Group similar ideas together to find themes
discussion_formats.when_to_use: After headline sharing to identify patterns
discussion_formats.facilitation_guide: Have team silently group headlines on a board, then discuss the clusters that emerge

discussion_formats.name: Round Robin
discussion_formats.description: Each person speaks in turn without interruption
discussion_formats.when_to_use: During stakeholder synthesis to ensure all voices heard
discussion_formats.facilitation_guide: Time each person (2 min), go around full circle, then open discussion

discussion_formats.name: Dot Voting
discussion_formats.description: Everyone gets limited votes to place on options
discussion_formats.facilitation_guide: 3 dots per person, can put multiple on one option, count and discuss results

success_indicators: Team can articulate mission in one sentence
All team members feel their voice was heard

axiom_zero_integration.opening_ritual: Read Axiom 0 aloud, then each person shares one hope for the project
axiom_zero_integration.closing_ritual: Each person expresses gratitude to someone who contributed a valuable insight
love_and_trust_moments: Headlines game celebrates each person's dreams without judgment
Stakeholder safari builds empathy through stepping into others' shoes
Mission discussion creates space for disagreement within trust
